source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

items.headline: Project Management Certification Preparation: Methodology, Simulation Practice Exam Tests + Tips for Project Management.
objectives_summary: To take and PASS the Project Management certification exams.
To understand how the Project Management methodology is implemented within an organization.

To learn Project Management principles, terminology and when qualified you will be able to act as an informed member of a project management team using the Project Management methodology within a project environment supporting Project Management.

items.title: Crash Course: Project Management Fundamentals [Earn 6 PDUs]
items.headline: Project Management Certification (PMP, CAPM) Introduction - Training on Project Management Skills and Fundamentals
objectives_summary: A complete and detailed overview of project management.
Background information on the development of project management as a field of expertise.
Sound fundamental project management knowledge.

items.title: How to Work as a Translation Project Manager
items.headline: Master the Translation Life Cycle, Translation Quality Metrics, Cross-Cultural Communication, and More
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to work as a freelance or in-house translation project manager: with tips, tools, and strategies to help you thrive under pressure. We will cover everything from the basics to more advanced strategies for translation QA, pricing, cross-cultural communication, negotiation, and more.
